DbStorage.ExistInStorage: SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM Table WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Column = @storageKey
DbStorage.ReadFromStorage: SELECT TOP 1 Column FROM Table WHERE Column = @storageKey
DbStorage.SearchInStoreage: SELECT TOP 5 StorageKey, StorageValue FROM Table WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE (@filter ISNULL OR [Key] LIKE '%' + @filter + '%') AND (@filter ISNULL OR [Value] LIKE '%' + @filter + '%')  ORDER BY LastExecutionTime DESC
